title: Tungsten Pickaxe
summaries: The Tungsten Pickaxe is an early-game pickaxe that is stronger than the Iron and Lead Pickaxes, but weaker than the Gold and Platinum Pickaxes. Compared to its alternate ore version, the Silver Pickaxe, it has more pickaxe power but is significantly slower in terms of mining speed. Unlike the Silver Pickaxe, it is able to mine Meteorite.
Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes.

statistics.Sell: 15
